summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Solid Waste Utility; amending Section 21.40.085 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 115475, adopted December 17, 1990); establishing a fee for depositing waste at the Argo Yard or its successor facility for the disposal by the City, a charge for shipping containers detained by haulers for more than 24 hours, an allowance for excessive turnaround time at the Argo Yard or it successor facility, and other sections in connection therewith.
